name: Penguin Love
description:
NOTE: This game is a work in progress, please send me your suggestions and help me improve it and make it more fun! =D

This game is about a penguins cruzade for love! Don't let your hearts go away, and stay away from those nasty bombs!
Losing 5 hearts make you lose a life. For each lost heart, before losing a life you can pick 5 to restore each heart missing.
Difficulty will increase progressively with time.

Have fun!

CHANGELOG

Version 0.2.0

  • Added Menus and Pause
  • Added Instructions

Versions 0.1.0

  • Basic functionality
  • Progressive increase of difficulty

In the next stages of development there will be:

  • A menu
  • Game pausing
  • More powerups
  • Animations
  • Levels (and the ability to jump)
  • Maybe coop?

Thanks for playing my game ^^,
Have fun!
